title: Formative Assessment Instructional Design for Respiratory Therapy Clinical Simulation

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of respiratory anatomy and fundamental treatment techniques
context.additional_context: A course for pre-service teachers to learn educational methods using respiratory therapy simulations, conducted in a smartphone-based LMS environment

learning_goals: Learners can apply patient assessment protocols with 80% accuracy through respiratory therapy simulation scenarios.
Learners can improve simulation performance skills by 20% based on formative assessment feedback.
Learners can achieve at least an intermediate level in communication skills during simulations based on a three-level peer assessment rubric.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
